Headline: 54th-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 54th-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near California.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near California.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
